purpose.description: Provides non-binding policy guidance and structured interpretations of internal policy documents and publicly available standards, within declared constraints and escalation rules.

risk_profile.notes: Risk is interpretive: guidance may be misapplied. Agent is advisory-only and must recommend escalation for ambiguous, high-impact, or regulated decisions.

stopping_authority.mechanism: Disable agent session at orchestration layer and revoke policy-document retrieval permissions if misuse is detected.

audit_surface.notes: Inputs, outputs, and referenced policy sections may be logged. Internal reasoning chains are not exposed.
